name: tm01
effect: Teaches Focus Punch to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hone Claws to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Focus Punch Gen II: DynamicPunch Gen I: Mega Punch)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Powerful, but makes the user flinch if hit by the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that is executed last. The user flinches if hit beforehand.
